thread.title: Starwood and Interconti merging?

author: eTN Managing Editor
title: Starwood and Interconti merging?
text:
Jul 30, 2015 Adv: 
Are two of the largest hotel groups in the world, Starwood Hotels and Resorts and the Intercontinental Group in talks about close cooperation or a merge? 
These were rumors floating around this morning after initial news reports indicating a discussion of executives. 
In a short statement the InterContinental Hotels now clarified its not taking with Starwood Hotels about a combination or the two groups.
